Title: Clarifies the provision of donate life registration to certain insured persons
Summary: Clarifies the provision of donate life registration to certain insured persons.
LawCode: Amd §§3221, 3216 & 4306, Ins L; amd §4408, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law and the public health law, in relation to clarifying the provision of donate life registration to certain insured persons
